name: Space Missiles!
description:
Space Missiles is a simple, fast 2D game where you have to survive as long as possible, dodging all the missiles that comes your way trying to shoot you down!

Use the simple controls make quick turns and avoid the missiles. Make use of shields and other pickups to your advantage. Earn extra points making the missiles collide with each other and collect stars to increase the final score.

Made with Godot Engine.
